\section{Problem B: Permutation test}

\subsection{1.}

```{r}

###################
# Prepare data
###################


bilirubin <- read.table("../files/bilirubin.txt", header = TRUE)

bilirubin <- mutate(bilirubin, log_meas = log(meas))

```


```{r}

####################
# Create boxplot
###################

ggplot(data = bilirubin) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = pers, y = log_meas, fill = pers)) +
  scale_fill_discrete(guide = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "person",
       y = expression(log(meas)))

```
```{r}

lm_1 <- lm(log_meas ~ pers, data = bilirubin)

summary(lm_1)
```
